about_the_game:
You are caught in a massive explosion and fall into a past era. Though you have lost your memory and power, you gain the ability of immortality. Suddenly, a mysterious talking jar appears before you. The jar reveals questions and secrets about this world, but it’s too early to trust this strange being. To regain your lost memory and power, join forces with the soul-eating jar to defeat monsters and grow stronger. Once you recover your memory, you must return to the future to save the world. However, a deadly truth that you are unaware of slowly begins to surface. The future may have already been destroyed. Can your choices change the fate of the future?

Repetitive Fun (Endless Challenge to Return to the Future)

Even if you die, you are reborn as an immortal hybrid, shattering the jar each time. To save humanity from monstrous creatures, you must find the gateway back to the future. Use the new relics and abilities you discover each time you die to continuously take on the challenge.

Varied Actions (mysterious Ally)

A mysterious witch provides you with various weapons. Utilize a variety of weapons, each with its own unique actions and skills, to experience different combat styles. Fight, grow, and unlock new actions through character traits.

Soul Jar (A Strange Jar with a Big Mouth)

The hero carries a living jar on their back. The jar, which bites at enemies, always supports you from behind. Gain strategic advantages in various combat situations by combining the jar, which develops new abilities each time it consumes a monster's soul, with your weapons.

The demo features a single stage with a limited selection of relics, abilities, and other elements. Defeat the boss, unlock various growth elements, and explore different ways to play!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750

short_description: RIM: Soul Jar is a hack and slash roguelite set in a world where medieval and futuristic elements mix. Become a warrior who has fallen into the past and embark on a journey to save the future with the Soul Jar. Cleanse dungeons of enemies and bosses, and set out to break the cycle of RIM.
